channel.title: Housemoon Sprinter Updates
channel.description: Find out when Housemoon Sprinter updates!

item.title: We're Back!
item.description: Housemoon Sprinter's back from the grave of being abandoned! Stay tuned for more craptoons!

item.title: Back Again
item.description: Housemoon wakes up and hosts his usual New Years Special, but the gang have had enough...

item.title: WGEmail: DVDs
item.description: Weak Good trys to review his own DVD boxset, but Housemoon rudely interrupts.

item.title: Scrapbook Scrappings: Weak Wad's Character Video
item.description: Last modified 24th August 2018 - What originally would have been a group of character videos, only this one got made. And its pretty dreadful.

item.title: Housemoon Sprinter in: Leaving the Puke Green World of Gameboypression
item.description: Happy Gameboy Day! Take this crappy prototype for a Housemoon gameboy game!

item.title: Main 8: Powered by Weak Good
item.description: Weak Good gets his chance to make how own Main Page! Free rickroll if you care enough.

item.title: Revived Housecast
item.description: The Housecast is back! Even has a Flash menu now!

item.title: New Blog Post!
item.description: Housemoon has posted a new post to his blog! Read it and weep!

item.title: Scrapbook Scrappings: Exploring the Internet / Back Again (Easter Egg)
item.description: Last modified 27th May 2018 - Originlly planned to be part of a giant internet forth wall break thing, it clearly failed hard or it wouldnt be here... / Last modified 3rd January 2022 - Originally planned to be an easter egg for Back Again, me wanting to release Back Again as early as possible doomed this easter egg into dying prematuraly.

item.title: Fatmoon Sprinter
item.description: Housemoon's gained some weight, and with it some internet fame.

item.title: Housemoon Sprinter in Toontastic
item.description: Housemoon gets kidnapped in some weird iOS app from the late 2000's.

item.title: New Blog Post!
item.description: Housemoon has posted a new post to his blog! Read it and weep!

item.title: The Platinum Jubilee Adventure
item.description: Housemoon doesn't care much for the Jubilee, so the gang go to London to make him like it.

item.title: Main 9: Behind the Scenes
item.description: Take a sneek peek at what goes on in the Housemoon Sprinter Studios, it ain't pretty.

item.title: Housecleaning with Housemoon
item.description: Housemoon accidentally spills Weak Good's urn, so Housemoon frantically cleans up his mistake!

item.title: WGEmail: memories
item.description: Housemoon supplements Weak Good's lack of emailage, by telling the story of his first email.

item.title: Venture Bros
item.description: The gang star in a recreation of The Venture Bros intro! Happy 18th Birthday!

item.title: Housemoon I
item.description: In the world of WarioWare: Housemoon breaks the forth wall!

item.title: Flash Tutorial
item.description: Made this for a friend, he was learning Flash, you should too!

item.title: Ween 2022
item.description: I was going to make some for the past 2 years but I never had the motivation till now.

item.title: Housemoon II
item.description: In the world of WarioWare: Weak Happy becomes Mona. OOooooh Yeah.

item.title: Housemoon III
item.description: In the world of WarioWare: Prev mode activated, isn't Mona 15?

item.title: Housemoon IV
item.description: In the world of WarioWare: Warioworld doesn't have bleach. Huh.

item.title: Flash 2
item.description: A craptoon by it's finest definition. At least it's got some easter eggs...

item.title: Main 10: Flash CS6
item.description: Coinciding with Flash 2, here comes another meta-commentary!

item.title: New Blog Post!
item.description: Housemoon ponders his new, and frankly sudden, audience! Whilst talking about why the Halloween cartoon isn't out yet.

item.title: Fairytale of New York
item.description: Housemoon and Weak Good duet on a classic Irish Christmas song, what jolly fun!

item.title: Christmas Revolution
item.description: For the Christmas season, the Housemoon Sprinter gang wanted to do something. This is certainly something.

item.title: New Blog Post!
item.description: Housemoon wishes you a Happy New Year! And promises things he can't deliver on.

item.title: 5th Year Teaser
item.description: Instead of getting a cool toon for the 5th anniversary, you get a TEASER for a toon! HOW OrIgInAl!!

item.title: New Blog Post!
item.description: Housemoon mentally contemplates the fact that his site has turned 5. Genuinely cute photograph too!

item.title: Main 11: Housecleaning
item.description: Housecleaning gets its due with its own main page!

item.title: New Blog Post!
item.description: Housemoon introduces the brand new patented Major Site Update! All rights reserved.

item.title: Scrapbook Scrappings: Internet Toon (Storyboard)
item.description: Drawn 08/2019? - I genuinely don't remember when this was made, but anyway, this was a storyboard made for said cartoon, the storyboard never got finished, but i recently filled the gaps. Yay.

item.title: Housemoon V
item.description: In the world of WarioWare: Housey & Weaky see the button. OH NO.

item.title: New Section: Comics!
item.description: Housemoon Sprinter is going to have comics now! Tune in every week for a new comic!

item.title: Comic: Issue 2 - Hawaii: Part I
item.description: Housemoon got drunk at somepoint, and somehow wrote parody lyrics, made instrumentals, and produced a whole album... Don't mess with Housemoon man!

item.title: Housemoon VI - IX
item.description: In the world of WarioWare: The ennealogy comes to an end, with the release of the final 4 parts.

item.title: Final Batch of Scrapbook Scrappings!
item.description: Scrapbook Scrappings is coming to an end, with all the useable material being released! The final additions are: Yu-Gi-Doh!, Mac VS. PC 2, Wgemail 10a, Mr. Terminal, The Laxmundham Axe Massacre, AIDs and finally. 5 Years, No Ideas!

item.title: Main 12: British Army
item.description: The final main page, and Housemoon falls to the might of the British Military. Great ending.

item.title: New Game: WGEmail 10b The Game
item.description: For being the only unreleased game in a remotely releaseable state... This is pretty damn alright.

item.title: Hawaii: Part I
item.description: Finally, the half of an album is released to the world!

item.title: Housemoon Sprinter New Years Special 2024
item.description: The true end, an anti-climatic one but still. Don't tell the Youtube folk the truth. ;)
